title: Elliott Broidy
deleted: Broidy is under a criminal investigation launched by the [[Prosecutor General of Ukraine]] for Broidy's June 12, 2014, deal to provide political support for [[VTB Bank]] and [[Investment Capital Ukraine|Investment Capital Ukraine (ICU)]], which acts as a financial advisor to [[President of Ukraine]] [[Petro Poroshenko]].<ref name=AlJazeera180320>{{cite news | last1 = Thorne | first1 = Will | last2 = Jordan | first2 = Will | title = Trump donor Elliott Broidy named in Ukraine criminal probe: Republican fundraiser Elliott Broidy under scrutiny over alleged deal with sanctioned Russian bank VTB. | url = https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2018/03/trump-donor-ukraine-criminal-probe-180307124432781.html | publisher = [[Al Jazeera]] | date = March 20, 2018 | archive-date = May 30, 2020 | archive-url = https://web.archive.org/web/20200530084423/https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2018/03/trump-donor-ukraine-criminal-probe-180307124432781.html | access-date = May 18, 2018}}</ref><ref name=VTBICUdeal>{{cite web | title = Broidy Capital Management Consulting Agreement | url = https://www.documentcloud.org/documents/4403331-Agreement.html | date = June 12, 2014 | access-date = May 18, 2018}}</ref> Broidy was to receive five payments of $2.5 million each through the British Virgin Islands firm with a Dubai address, Quillas Equities SA, which has [[Yuri Alekseevich Soloviev|Yuri Soloviev]] as a large shareholder according to the Panama Papers.<ref name=AlJazeera180320/><ref name=OCCRP160405>{{cite news | last1 = Bigus | first1 = Denys | last2 = Shleynov | first2 = Roman | title = A high-profile Russian partner of Ukraine’s top banker | url = https://www.occrp.org/en/panamapapers/high-profile-russian-partner-of-ukraines-top-banker/ | publisher = OCCRP | date = April 5, 2016 | archive-date = November 10, 2018 | archive-url = https://web.archive.org/web/20181110080319/https://www.occrp.org/en/panamapapers/high-profile-russian-partner-of-ukraines-top-banker/ | access-date = May 18, 2018}}</ref> Yuri Soloviev is a member of the management board for VTB and is the first deputy president and chairman of its management board.<ref name=AlJazeera180320/><ref name=VTBManagementBoard>{{cite web | title = Члены правления Банк ВТБ (ПАО) | url = https://www.vtb.ru/o-banke/bank-vtb/pravlenie/ | language = Russian | trans-title = Members of the Management Board VTB Bank (PJSC) | publisher = VTB | archive-date = May 19, 2018 | archive-url = https://web.archive.org/web/20180519204357/https://www.vtb.ru/o-banke/bank-vtb/pravlenie/ | access-date = May 18, 2018}}</ref> Yuri Soloviev's Quillas Equities has accounts in the Swiss [[The Pictet Group|Pictet Bank]] through which money transfers often occur to the VTB-owned bank in Cyprus, [[RCB Bank|RCB Cyprus]].<ref name=OCCRP160405/>
